length_independent_effect.evidence: Within hydrophilic peptides alone, r drops from 0.751 (medium) to 0.259 (long)
length_independent_effect.interpretation: Length affects prediction quality even when hydrophobicity is controlled

hydrophobicity_independent_effect.evidence: Within medium-length peptides, r drops from 0.751 (hydrophilic) to 0.262 (hydrophobic)
hydrophobicity_independent_effect.interpretation: Hydrophobicity affects prediction quality even when length is controlled

PRIORITY 3: Expand balanced hydrophobicity samples across all lengths
model_improvements: Add explicit amphipathic moment features (helix wheel)

architectural_options: Option A: Length-stratified models (separate for short vs long)
